links_reviews_title: Not for larger folks, but beautiful fabric
links_reviews_text: If you are a person who wears a L/XL beware of this beautiful blouse. Mine came with the tags still on - amazing! - but that betrayed the real sizing. An XL in this brand is an AU 14, which is a US 10 (2-3 sizes smaller than a normal XL). I'm a true US size 14/16, and am happily wearing an XL in every other item I rented in my Nuuly this month with room to spare. Unfortunately, if you have the actual measurements of an XL, especially with broad shoulders, there is no way you can wear this piece. For smaller folks: the fabric is lovely, the detailing is exquisite (gold button accents, trendy puffed shoulders, neck bow, and a narrowed and gathered wrist seam). If you're looking something trendy for Zoom calls and have a narrower body type, I'd definitely recommend it, but size up!
